description.originalText:
Our family is incredibly fortunate to have found such a remarkable nanny. From the moment she joined us in 2020, it was evident that she was not just a caregiver, but a nurturing presence who truly loves and understands our son. She has been with our family since our son was 2-year-old and our soon to be first grader truly adores her! 
She goes above and beyond to ensure that our child’s needs are met with patience, kindness, and genuine interest. Whether it's preparing nutritious meals, organizing creative activities, or simply lending a listening ear, she consistently exceeds our expectations. She has exceptional communication skills and keeps us informed about our child’s daily routines, and any concerns that may arise. Her open and transparent approach has fostered a strong sense of trust and partnership between us. She is punctual, responsible, and always willing to accommodate our family's schedule changes with grace and flexibility. We have complete peace of mind knowing that our son is in her capable hands. We are truly grateful for her for everything she has done for our family!

description.displayText: We love Joelika! She is awesome, super sweet and tries her hardest to be available even if it's last minute. She is willing to work with your schedule even if it includes last minute changes. I trust her with my child, and I rarely trust anyone. I would hire her anytime!
description.originalText: We love Joelika! She is awesome, super sweet and tries her hardest to be available even if it's last minute. She is willing to work with your schedule even if it includes last minute changes. I trust her with my child, and I rarely trust anyone. I would hire her anytime!

description.displayText: Joelika has been absolutely awesome from beginning to end. She is my first nanny and this experience has been nothing but amazing. I actually hate to see her go but we're still use her for any time that I need assistance. Joelika awesome with my son and they have developed a great bond she's punctual,  very understanding, flexible and nurturing. She always present for self in a professional manner. she's very well organized and comes up with various neat learning activities to keep him entertained while also learning. You can tell that she's educated within the childhood build because shes sure to work on hitting the milestones that fit his age group. She goes above and beyond to help out with anything that she can pertaining to my son and household. Overall I would definitely say that she's an amazing person and will be a huge asset to any family.

description.displayText: My son instantly gravitated to Joelika's positive energy. She went above and beyond with taking the initiative to do some light cleaning.  It was a nice surprise to come home to after work.  I would highly recommend her to any family.
description.originalText: My son instantly gravitated to Joelika's positive energy. She went above and beyond with taking the initiative to do some light cleaning.  It was a nice surprise to come home to after work.  I would highly recommend her to any family.

description.displayText: Joelika is excellent with our 18-month old boy. We've hired her a few times now and she's always been on time, friendly, professional, responsive, and caring. We will continue using Joelika for sure.
description.originalText: Joelika is excellent with our 18-month old boy. We've hired her a few times now and she's always been on time, friendly, professional, responsive, and caring. We will continue using Joelika for sure.

description.displayText: She was very unprofessional. We scheduled an interview and arranged our schedules accordingly to meet her. She never showed up and did not have common courtesy to let us know in advance that she was not coming. She sent a note later that evening that she was no longer interested in a position. I would never trust her with my kid.
description.originalText: She was very unprofessional. We scheduled an interview and arranged our schedules accordingly to meet her. She never showed up and did not have common courtesy to let us know in advance that she was not coming. She sent a note later that evening that she was no longer interested in a position. I would never trust her with my kid.

description.displayText: I really can't say enough good things about Joelika. She is punctual, loving, educational, children light up when she is in the room ( I truly believe they read energy). She is the perfect balance of nurturing/fun/educational. I am a very OCD person, and she is as well and I always walk into a home as clean as I left it. Needless to say my son loves her. I write this begrudgingly because I don't want to let her go. My job has weird hours, and sadly comes to an end after several months, and she worked with my crazy schedule as well!

description.displayText: Joelika has watched my daughter since she was 5 months. She is great with children and I trust her responsibility and judgement. She has always found a way to make sure she is there even if it my be short notice. She is a great cook as well.
